column4: Hello all, I've a practical question: I've read on the web that Ubuntu did not quite supported motherboard with Core 2 Duo and intel 965 chipset sata, is it still the case ? Currently on Vista, I'm slowly planning my jump on Ubuntu, if I can get hold of my whole system
Of course! The default download is the Desktop CD, which is a live CD and has an installer on it.
The Desktop CD is a live CD.
